Models¶

class lab_requisition.models.BaseBaseRequisition(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bhp_sync.classes.base_sync_model.BaseSyncModel

does not include additional tests

Parameters:
  • requisition_identifier (CharField) – Requisition id
  • requisition_datetime (DateTimeField) – Requisition date
  • specimen_identifier (CharField) – Specimen id
  • protocol (CharField) – Use three digit code e.g 041, 056, 062, etc
  • site_id (ForeignKey) – Site
  • clinician_initials (InitialsField) – Type 2-3 letters, all in uppercase and no spaces
  • aliquot_type_id (ForeignKey) – Note: Lists only those types associtaed with the Panel.
  • panel_id (ForeignKey) – Panel
  • priority (CharField) – Priority
  • is_drawn (CharField) – If No, provide a reason below
  • reason_not_drawn (CharField) – If not drawn, please explain
  • drawn_datetime (DateTimeField) – If not drawn, leave blank. Same as date and time of finger prick in case on DBS.
  • item_type (CharField) – Item collection type
  • item_count_total (IntegerField) – Number of tubes, samples, cards, etc being sent for this test/order only. Determines number of labels to print
  • estimated_volume (DecimalField) – If applicable, estimated volume of sample for this test/order. This is the total volume if number of “tubes” above is greater than 1
  • comments (TextField) – Comments
  • is_receive (BooleanField) – Received
  • is_receive_datetime (DateTimeField) – Rcv-date
  • is_packed (BooleanField) – Packed
  • is_labelled (BooleanField) – Labelled
  • is_labelled_datetime (DateTimeField) – Label-date
  • is_lis (BooleanField) – Lis
prepare_requisition_identifier(**kwargs)¶

Generate and return a locally unique requisition identifier for a device (adds device id)

prepare_specimen_identifier(**kwargs)¶

add protocol, site and check digit

print_label(request, **kwargs)¶

Print a labels using the print label() method on the RequisitionLabel class.
